org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class ale.Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.ale.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    ale

    @NoOffset
public static class ale.Console
extends org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
    This class represents the entire game console.

    Version:
    $Id: Console.hxx,v 1.61 2007/07/27 13:49:16 stephena Exp $
    Author:
    Bradford W. Mott

               ale.Cartridge cart,
               @Const @ByRef
               ale.Properties props)

        Parameters:
        osystem - The OSystem object to use
        cart - The cartridge to use with this console
        props - The properties for the cartridge

        Parameters:
